messages.subject: Re: SIR!
messages.msgSnippet: Just to let everyone know I responded to A Muz privately. Sorry for not getting back to people sooner... Just a reminder password for the Shinsengumi folder
messages.messageBody:
Just to let everyone know I responded to A Muz privately.

Sorry for not getting back to people sooner... Just a reminder
password for the "Shinsengumi" folder is "Miburo" and those wanting
to see the other folders (if any are available) please IM me on
yahoo "mg_batt" or e-mail mg_batt@... to get a password.

messages.subject: Re: SIR!
messages.msgSnippet: In addition, in future posts please refrain from double-posting. I have taken the liberty of deleting your other post. Yahoo -will- post your message-- sooner
messages.messageBody:
In addition, in future posts please refrain from double-posting. I
have taken the liberty of deleting your other post. Yahoo -will- post
your message-- sooner or later, as we've found out-- so there's no
need to get impatient with it and rewrite your entire message.

Thank you in advance for your consideration.

--Masayoshi

messages.subject: RE: [SHQ] SIR!
messages.msgSnippet: Especially considering that private individuals are using their own money to provide us with such generous accessibility to things... phil Hirotada Tokugawa
messages.messageBody:
Especially considering that private individuals are using their own money to provide us with such generous accessibility to things...

phil

Hirotada Tokugawa <patriot014@...> wrote:
Please rest assured that we are currently looking into this. However, we
would also appreciate it if you stopped posting messages that sounded so
agitated. (such as the subject line, and some of your previous messages).
There is really no reason to get upset. Please take it easy, and we'll get
back to you with the necessary passwords.

--Masayoshi

would also appreciate it if you stopped posting messages that sounded so
